content:
I'll add that to the notes. Here's the updated entry:

**Trip 1: Chicago, February**

* Destination: Chicago, USA
* Dates: [Insert dates, e.g., February 10-14]
* Duration: 4 days
* Airline: United Airlines
* Class: Economy Plus (upgraded due to loyalty program)
* Notes:
	+ Layover at Denver International Airport (DEN) on return journey
	+ Grabbed lunch at a BBQ joint at DEN (same one discovered last year)

Now, are you ready to move on to another trip? Have you taken any other trips recently, or do you want to add more details to this one?
